p: Phase transformation studies were carried out using DIL805A/D dilatometer (TA Instruments, Milford, MA, USA), and the critical transformation points (temperatures) were determined according to [ 22, 23, 24]. The heating rate was 1 °C∙s −1 with holding time 30 min. at an austenitizing temperature of 850 °C. The cooling rate ranged from 100 °C∙s −1 to 0.01 °C∙s −1. Cooling regimens used for construction the CCT diagram of AISI 4340 steel are shown in Figure 2.
